title: lane_manager.rb:106:in `choose_lane': [!] uninitialized constant Fastlane::LaneManager::Terminal (NameError)
body:
### New Issue Checklist - [x] Updated fastlane to the latest version - [x] I read the [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - [x] I read [docs.fastlane.tools](https://docs.fastlane.tools) - [x] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues) ### Issue Description After upgrading fastlane from 2.87-0 to 2.90.0 running any lane command fails. Running fastlane alone fails too. Removing lanes from the `Fastfile` makes the error go away, but is not a very useful workaround. It would be nice to have a command to *downgrade* fastlane versions. **EDIT**: Ah, recovered 2.87 from time machine and now everything works again. ##### Complete output when running fastlane, including the stack trace and command used 
[0:gradha@sera.home:0] [~/Desktop/test]$ fastlane
[19:01:50]: ------------------------------
[19:01:50]: --- Step: default_platform ---
[19:01:50]: ------------------------------

Looking for related GitHub issues on fastlane/fastlane...

‚û°Ô∏è  S3 Action is not able to find Access Key and Secret Access Key
    https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues/4295 [closed] 22 üí¨
    12 Jan 2017

‚û°Ô∏è  Remove Shenzhen dependency
    https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/pull/6991 [closed] 19 üí¨
    13 Mar 2017

üîó  You can ‚åò + double-click on links to open them directly in your browser.
/Users/gradha/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib/ruby/gems/2.2.0/gems/fastlane-2.90.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/lane_manager.rb:106:in `choose_lane': [!] uninitialized constant Fastlane::LaneManager::Terminal (NameError)

	from /Users/gradha/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib/ruby/gems/2.2.0/gems/fastlane-2.90.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/commands_generator.rb:333:in `run'
	from /Users/gradha/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib/ruby/gems/2.2.0/gems/fastlane-2.90.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/commands_generator.rb:42:in `start'
	from /Users/gradha/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib/ruby/gems/2.2.0/gems/fastlane-2.90.0/fastlane/lib/fastlane/cli_tools_distributor.rb:107:in `take_off'

	from /Users/gradha/.fastlane/bin/bundle/bin/fastlane:22:in `

```ruby
  lane :custom_lane do
    # add actions here: https://docs.fastlane.tools/actions
  end
end

```
